name: self-indulgence
description:
SELF-INDULGENCE delves into the tormented mind of its developer. As the player, you take on the role of Dan, navigating a world symbolizing a self-destructive cycle. Confront and battle your inner demons, uncover deep-rooted secrets, and strive to break free from the chains of weakness.

Features and Content:

Narrative-Driven Exploration: Discover a story that's a mirror to the developer's life.
Interactive Environments: Engage with objects and clues that help unravel Dan's past.
Character Interaction: Help Dan's son, Singh, through meaningful choices and dialogues.
Puzzle-solving: Challenge your mind with puzzles that symbolize inner conflicts.
Atmospheric Soundscapes: Immerse yourself in haunting soundtracks and effects that heighten the tension.
Fixed Cameras: Experience the suspense with classic fixed camera angles, enhancing the feeling of uncertainty.
Flashlight Interactions: Use your flashlight not just to navigate but also to interact with lurking enemies, adding a layer of strategy and intensity.
PSX Style Graphics: Relive the golden era of gaming with retro, pixelated visuals reminiscent of PlayStation 1.
